desc_custom_group: Repeat a series of tasks by setting loop count and logic
tip_loop_settings: If referencing an array, the loop count is the array length; if specifying a count, the loop count is the specified number
tip_loop_array: Only supports referencing arrays, loop count is the array length
tip_intermediate_variable: Variables can be shared across multiple loops, used to pass variables between loops
tip_output: Content output after loop completion, only supports referencing output variables from nodes in the loop
ph_input_variable_value: Enter variable value, type '/' to insert variable
